ExternalData.Titlesect: Agreement establishing the Fund for the Development of the Indigenous Peoples of Latin America and the Caribbean

TreatyText.Label: Text
TreatyText.Text: United Nations, Treaty Series, vol. 1728, p. 380; Document of the Intergovernmental Technical Meeting for the Preparation of the Indigenous Fund, La Paz, Bolivia, of 20 June 1992.

TreatyNote.Text: The Agreement, of which the English, Portuguese and Spanish texts are equally authentic, was adopted during the Second Summit Meeting of Ibero-American Heads of State, held at Madrid from 23 to 24 July 1992. In accordance with its article 14 (1), the Agreement was opened for signature at Madrid on 24 July 1992 and shall remain open for signature at the Headquarters of the United Nations.
